short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up extension for specific words, in any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select any text in any website, right click and choose from "LookItUp" menu your selection.

LookItUp will open your the website you've selected, together with the the word you've selected.
